description:
This course is for you who want to be able to start practicing the Norwegian language immediately. Either as a tourist or as a newcomer to Norway.

You will have a brief introduction to the grammar, to understand some main principles.

But most of the course will cover knowledge connected to the oral language. Like different rules for pronunciation, ask/answer questions, numbers, phrases to introduce yourself, express feelings and opinions, and phrases for everyday use.

The intonation and the pronunciation you will hear and learn through the course, because I speak Norwegian. (you can read in English) I speak slowly and clearly so that it is easy for you to follow along.

This course consists of 7 sections (+ bonus section) with more than 30 lectures, and most of the lectures are videos with downloadable documents/pdf's, and there are some exercises for you to practice.  All the slides I use are downloadable.

In the bonus section I will continue to ad content.
title: Speak Norwegian!  crash course
